item.title: Installation
item.description: Djazz needs no special installation. Download the djazz folder here. Open Max.

item.title: Djazz Main Window
item.description: 1. MIDI/audio window selectors Clicking on the button labeled “MIDI” or “Audio” will open and close the MIDI or audio interface window, respectively.

item.title: MIDI Window
item.description: Live Input View Scores View MIDI Out Bank Tracks View

item.title: Audio Window
item.description: 7. AUDIO UI Audio Live Input Audio Track Playback & Improvising – see Midi Track Volume dial and reset click Mute Audio Out Audio Out Track Volume dial and reset click Solo Mute Volume meter Il y a un patch pour extraire les données de la grille des partitions audio textuelles comme celles que vous avez envoyées vers le nouveau format : patchers/data_file_makers/text_score_to_audio_grid_data.

item.title: Effects Bar
item.description: Pitch Transposition Changes the pitch of the MIDI output Octave Transposition Changes the octave of the MIDI output Speed Changes the speed of the MIDI output Loop Loops the previous n beats of the MIDI output “Jam” (Improvise) “Jam” Button Turns the improviser on.

item.title: Tools
item.description: Djazz comes with many preloaded songs, but you can also load your own songs to play and improvise on.

item.title: Saving and Loading Files
item.description: Djazz saves files together in folders.

item.title: View Messages
item.description: The following messages are sent out of Djazz via its UDP send port:
